TABLE.NAME: tool_lp_competency
TABLE.COMMENT: This table contains the master record of each competency in a framework.

FIELD.NAME: shortname
FIELD.COMMENT: Shortname of a competency

FIELD.NAME: description
FIELD.COMMENT: Description of a single competency

FIELD.NAME: descriptionformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The format of the description field

FIELD.NAME: competencyframeworkid
FIELD.COMMENT: The framework this competency relates to.

FIELD.NAME: parentid
FIELD.COMMENT: The parent competency.

FIELD.NAME: visible
FIELD.COMMENT: Used to hide the competency.

FIELD.NAME: path
FIELD.COMMENT: Used to speed up queries that use an entire branch of the tree. Looks like /5/34/54.

FIELD.NAME: sortorder
FIELD.COMMENT: Relative sort order within the branch

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: The time this competency was created.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The time this competency was last modified.

FIELD.NAME: usermodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The user who last modified this competency

FIELD.NAME: shortname
FIELD.COMMENT: Short name for the competency framework.

FIELD.NAME: idnumber
FIELD.COMMENT: Unique idnumber for this competency framework.

FIELD.NAME: description
FIELD.COMMENT: Description of this competency framework

FIELD.NAME: descriptionformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The format of the description field

FIELD.NAME: scaleid
FIELD.COMMENT: Scale used to define competency.

FIELD.NAME: scaleconfiguration
FIELD.COMMENT: Scale information.

FIELD.NAME: visible
FIELD.COMMENT: Used to show/hide this competency framework.

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: The time this competency framework was created.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The time this competency framework was last modified.

FIELD.NAME: usermodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The user who last modified this framework

TABLE.NAME: tool_lp_course_competency
TABLE.COMMENT: Link a competency to a course.

FIELD.NAME: courseid
FIELD.COMMENT: The course this competency is linked to.

FIELD.NAME: competencyid
FIELD.COMMENT: The competency that is linked to this course.

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: The time this link was created.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The time this link was modified.

FIELD.NAME: usermodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The user who modified this link.

FIELD.NAME: sortorder
FIELD.COMMENT: The display order for this link.

FIELD.NAME: shortname
FIELD.COMMENT: Short name for the learning plan template.

FIELD.NAME: idnumber
FIELD.COMMENT: Unique idnumber for this learning plan template.

FIELD.NAME: description
FIELD.COMMENT: Description of this learning plan template

FIELD.NAME: descriptionformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The format of the description field

FIELD.NAME: visible
FIELD.COMMENT: Used to show/hide this learning plan template.

FIELD.NAME: duedate
FIELD.COMMENT: The default due date for instances of this plan.

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: The time this learning plan template was created.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The time this learning plan template was last modified.

FIELD.NAME: usermodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The user who last modified this learning plan template

TABLE.NAME: tool_lp_template_competency
TABLE.COMMENT: Link a competency to a learning plan template.

FIELD.NAME: templateid
FIELD.COMMENT: The template this competency is linked to.

FIELD.NAME: competencyid
FIELD.COMMENT: The competency that is linked to this course.

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: The time this link was created.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The time this link was modified.

FIELD.NAME: usermodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The user who modified this link.

FIELD.NAME: sortorder
FIELD.COMMENT: Relative sort order
